name: FIT 4 FUNZ
description:
Uncovered from an old VHS library, this low budget workout video is revealed once again to the public, featuring none other than D class TV personality, Billy van der Burger. Try to reach the end of his workout routine. He won't take kindly to your mistakes, so much so that they're painful to him! So get ready for a speedier challenge if it comes to it. 

CONTROLS:

E - Left hand 

F - Left Leg

J - Right Leg

I - Right Hand
